labels.select-fulfillment: Select fulfillment center for exported inventory
labels.select-pricelist: Select price list for exported prices
labels.note: All catalog products information should be exported to CSV file, download URL will be available after export is finished
labels.caution-description: Sorting your CSV file in a spreadsheet program can cause product variants or image URLs to become disassociated. Importing a sorted CSV file may overwrite your existing products with bad data, which cannot be recovered

placeholders.select-fulfillment: Select fulfillment or leave blank for default...
placeholders.select-pricelist: Select price list or leave blank for default...

labels.select-fulfillment: Select fulfillment center for exported inventory
labels.select-pricelist: Select price list for exported prices

catalog-CSV-import.title: Import catalog from CSV
catalog-CSV-import.subtitle: All products will be added to '{{name}}' catalog

labels.auto-mapping-description: Select fields from your CSV file to map to the dynamic product fields. If a property exists in the catalog, it will be mapped by name. Otherwise, it is added as a product property as is
labels.chose-map-description: Select fields from your CSV file to map to the system product fields

catalog-CSV-import-wizard-mapping-step.title: Column mapping
catalog-CSV-import-wizard-mapping-step.subtitle: Manually map product properties to CSV columns

catalog-csv-export.name: VirtoCommerce CSV export
catalog-csv-export.description: Native VirtoCommerce catalog data export to CSV

catalog-csv-import.name: VirtoCommerce CSV import
catalog-csv-import.description: Native VirtoCommerce catalog data import from CSV

CreateDictionaryValues.title: Create new dictionary values
CreateDictionaryValues.description: Enable/ disable creation of new property dictionary values during import

ExportFileNameTemplate.title: Export file name template
ExportFileNameTemplate.description: Specify the template (pattern) used to generate the exported file name. The template can include parameters such as '0' for the UTC time of file generation

VirtoCommerce.CatalogCsvImport.title: CSV catalog import module
VirtoCommerce.CatalogCsvImport.description: Adds CSV import functionality to catalog
